posts.title: Tacos
posts.content: Someone said we should let more Mexicans move to the US so there will be more taco restaurants.

posts.title: Pretty for a black girl
posts.content: Someone said to me 'you are the best looking black girl I've met'

posts.title: Jackie Chan
posts.content: My first name is Jackie, and I'm Asian. Someone said to me, 'you should marry someone whose last name is Chan.'

posts.title: Your food is so weird!
posts.content: Someone said to me, 'Ewwwww, what's that? You are always eating weird food. But you are so cute. I love you.'
